game.name: Boo! Are you scared? The Chests Game
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Boo! Are you scared? Don't be afraid, I'm a friend. Play the «Chests» card game for souvenirs with your new friend.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Boo! Are you scared? Don't be afraid, I'm a friend. Play the «Chests» card game for souvenirs with your new friend.

reviewHighlights.text: Released gallons of shit out of fear. Please beware, your're in for a horrifying scare.
